title: Elon Musk, Plus a Circle of Confidants, Tightens Control Over Twitter
description: The billionaire and a group of his friends and advisers are working on layoff plans and how to swiftly change Twitter’s product, said people with knowledge of the matter.
dc:creator: Mike Isaac, Ryan Mac and Kate Conger

media:content.media:description: Elon Musk, the new owner of Twitter, has flown to New York after spending much of last week at the social media company’s San Francisco headquarters.
